text:
Alabama Educational Television Commission
PROTECTIVE LIFE BUILDING
BIRMINGHAM 3. ALABAMA
February 20, 1961
Dear Bill:
Enclosed you will find a copy of comments submitted for the
purpose of being included in those used at the hearing on the
Magnuson Bill S. 205 on March 1, 1961.
Thank you for your attention in this matter.
Sincerely yours,
Mr. William G. Harley
President
NAEB
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington 6, D. C.
r
